children.title: Divorce/Separation
children.definition: You want a mediator to help you and your spouse negotiate a divorce or separation agreement.

children.title: Child/Custody
children.definition: You want a mediator to help you and your child’s other parent negotiate an agreement on issues like child support, custody, or co-parenting.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You want a mediator to help negotiate a family dispute that is not included in another category, or you are not sure what to choose.

children.title: Business Dispute
children.definition: You want a mediator to help negotiate a resolution to a dispute between you and someone with whom you’ve done business.

children.title: Business Partnership
children.definition: You want a mediator to help negotiate resolution of a dispute between you and a business partner.

children.title: Breach of Contract
children.definition: You want a mediator to help negotiate resolution of a dispute concerning terms of a contract that were not met.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You want a mediator to help negotiate a contracts or business dispute that is not included in another category, or you are not sure what to choose.

children.title: Adult Guardianship
children.definition: You want a mediator to help you and one or more others negotiate an agreement on the care, property, and finances of an adult who cannot take care of themselves anymore.

children.title: Estate Issue
children.definition: You want a mediator to help negotiate resolution of a dispute between you and other heirs/potential heirs over the estate of someone who died without a will, or whose will is being contested.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You want a mediator to help negotiate resolution of a dispute concerning an estate or inheritance that is not included in another category, or you are not sure what to choose.

children.title: Landlord / Tenant
children.definition: You want a mediator to help negotiate resolution of a dispute about unpaid rent, breach of a lease, or housing conditions in a rental property.

children.title: Mortgage / Foreclosure
children.definition: You want a mediator to help negotiate resolution of a dispute regarding payment of a mortgage.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You want a mediator to help negotiate a housing dispute that is not included in another category, or you are not sure what to choose.

children.title: Wages and Benefits
children.definition: You want a mediator to help you negotiate an agreement with an employer concerning your wages or other employment benefits.

children.title: Wrongful Termination
children.definition: You want a mediator to help negotiate resolution of a dispute concerning being unfairly fired from your job or not having your contract renewed.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You want a mediator to help negotiate an employment issue that is not included in another category, or you are not sure what to choose.

children.title: All Other Issues
children.definition: You want a mediator to help negotiate any other issues
